Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory547.jpg'}
{3: 'She walks forward.'}
{3: 'She has been walking for a very long time, uncertain where to go.'}
{3: 'But when she reaches this place, she feels like she should stay here for a while.'}
{3: 'She walks past ruin after ruin, tallying the patterns and marks she can barely recognize. She even sees a hideous plate that says "Evacuation Site 184â€”Acadia Evacuation".'}
{3: "Walking along the ruins, she finds an underground theater. Its spacious hall and the dilapidated interior tell the story of the theater's past grandeur."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory528.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'There is no music in this place, only two dying figures. One of them is quite young, the other fairly senior.'}
{3: 'The girl is clearly sick, her hasty breathing seemingly blowing away what little life she has left.'}
{3: 'The old soldier leans on the crumbling backdrop, his injuries suggesting that he was in an intense battle. The red lights from his wounds are particularly blinding.'}
{3: 'They seem to be infected with some virus. She should remember the name, but she cannot.'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: "Aargh... C-calling conservation area 184... I've found the missing kid...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: "I was attacked by Corrupted during the mission... I'm damaged beyond the threshold... Please send reinforcement...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She knows those words. She has heard them before.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Not here. Somewhere far away, where a young girl cried in the same way.'}
{3: 'She does not want to hear that cry anymore.'}
{3: 'She steps forward, hoping to assist the two figures.'}
{3: "But as she approaches them, the girl's breathing gets faster, and the limping body of the soldier tenses up."}
{3: 'Did... she do that? Hesitant, she stops. She dares not to get closer, seeing how their conditions worsen.'}

{3: 'Suddenly, the soldier raises a hand, seemingly trying to get up. His damaged frame gives in soon, however, falling forward after moving a few inches. But she finds his trembling finger pointing toward her.'}
{3: 'She looks down and sees a device.'}
{3: 'The gap in her mind seems to be filled up perfectly by the shape of this device.'}
{3: 'It is a transmitter, she realizes.'}

{3: "She turns on the device that the soldier cannot reach. After a brief pause, she decides to input the soldier's cry from earlier as well. Then she leaves before her memory returns to her like a deadly tempest."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'She keeps walking forward.'}
{3: 'She has been walking for a very long time, uncertain where to go.'}
{3: 'She seems to be traveling in a universe. Not that she remembers what a universe is exactly, but she can feel the boundless space when she thinks of that word.'}
{3: 'Then, she stops.'}
{3: 'Light purple petals enter her view, spreading all over the field.'}
{3: 'As if the boundless universe suddenly opens a purple eye, she is drawn by a tender but unwavering gravity.'}
{3: 'She reaches the eye. She can hear the rustling of the flowers by her feet. For a moment, she is surrounded by the gravity of love, and the empty void of space leaves her in an instant.'}
{3: 'Then she hears a call. She turns around.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz2903.jpg'}
{3: 'The stars that have watched this planet for millennia turn to watch her.'}
{3: 'She feels dizzy and dazed in their gazes.'}
{3: 'But she does not stop looking.'}
{3: 'She watches them one by one, going over one eye after another. At last, she stops on one of them.'}
{3: 'She can see it blinking. It seems to be singing to her.'}
{3: 'She feels compelled to respond.'}
{3: 'So she sings, quietly, to the star.'}
